org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.learning.listener

Interface TrainingListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataManagerTrainingListener

    public interface TrainingListener
    The base definition of all training event listeners
    Author:
    Alexandre Boulanger

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  TrainingListener.ListenerResponse 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onEpochTrainingResult(IEpochTrainer trainer, IDataManager.StatEntry statEntry)
      Called when an epoch has been completed
      TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onNewEpoch(IEpochTrainer trainer)
      Called before the start of every epoch.
      void onTrainingEnd()
      Called once when the training has finished.
      TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onTrainingProgress(ILearning learning)
      Called regularly to monitor the training progress.
      TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onTrainingStart()
      Called once when the training starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onTrainingStart

        TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onTrainingStart()
        Called once when the training starts.
        Returns:
        A ListenerResponse telling the source of the event if it should go on or cancel the training.

      • onTrainingEnd

        void onTrainingEnd()
        Called once when the training has finished. This method is called even when the training has been aborted.

      • onNewEpoch

        TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onNewEpoch(IEpochTrainer trainer)
        Called before the start of every epoch.
        Parameters:
        trainer - A IEpochTrainer
        Returns:
        A ListenerResponse telling the source of the event if it should continue or stop the training.

      • onEpochTrainingResult

        TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onEpochTrainingResult(IEpochTrainer trainer,
                                                        IDataManager.StatEntry statEntry)
        Called when an epoch has been completed
        Parameters:
        trainer - A IEpochTrainer
        statEntry - A IDataManager.StatEntry
        Returns:
        A ListenerResponse telling the source of the event if it should continue or stop the training.

      • onTrainingProgress

        TrainingListener.ListenerResponse onTrainingProgress(ILearning learning)
        Called regularly to monitor the training progress.
        Parameters:
        learning - A ILearning
        Returns:
        A ListenerResponse telling the source of the event if it should continue or stop the training.
